How many people are affected by succinate-CoA ligase deficiency ?,"Although the exact prevalence of succinate-CoA ligase deficiency is unknown, it appears to be very rare. This condition occurs more frequently among people from the Faroe Islands in the North Atlantic Ocean.",GHR,succinate-CoA ligase deficiency
What are the genetic changes related to succinate-CoA ligase deficiency ?,"Succinate-CoA ligase deficiency results from mutations in the SUCLA2 or S
